entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
